attributes.action: Make High Streets Duty Free with 0% VAT for all face to face Transactions
attributes.additional_details:
By abolishing VAT on the high street, 
- You will give them a Real chance of compete in this changing environment. 
- Increase jobs in the retail sector 
- Revitalize our towns and cities.
attributes.background: It impossible not to notice the massive decline in retail sales due to the easy of online, this is ruining the British tradition of 'The high streets' and turning our towns and cities into runs of bordered up shops. Make The High Street Great Again.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you'd like VAt to be abolished on all face-to-face transactions (which would include shops outside town centres, including out-of-town retail parks) or only on face-to-face transactions on high streets. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
